name: Something is wrong.
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED

Something is wrong.  You've been having a bad day and the last thing you needed was a cryptic entity telling you you've got 30 seconds to live.

Use your mouse to click the links.

My first Twine project for Brackeys Jam with the theme Rewind.

Ratings are appreciated and critique is encouraged, I know there are some bugs here but this was the best I could do.
